name: Kaplan's Journey
description:
Hi,

I'm a big fan of narrative adventure games, like What Remains of Edith Finch, Gone Home or The Stanley Parable, and so I decided to give it a go and make my own game: Kaplan's Journey.

I'm still in the very early stages of the project but I'd really appreciate if you could spend few minutes to download it, play it and give me your feedback.

I'm planning to publish updates often, ideally weekly, so please visit this page again soon!
